summary: This is an email chain from December 10, 2008, discussing the preparation and delivery of a letter regarding Jeffrey Epstein's work release. It involves coordination between individuals to finalize and hand-deliver the letter, with a copy intended for 'the Col.'

persons.name: Josefsberg
persons.role: Attorney or legal professional associated with Epstein's case
persons.context: Mentioned as the author of letters that are ready in the FedEx bin, indicating involvement in the legal correspondence regarding Epstein's work release.

events.title: Coordination on Epstein Work Release Letter
events.description: Email exchange regarding the finalization and hand delivery of a letter concerning Jeffrey Epstein's work release, with copies prepared for distribution.

keyFacts: On December 10, 2008, there was active coordination via email regarding a letter related to Jeffrey Epstein's work release.
Letters authored by Mr. Josefsberg were prepared and placed in a FedEx bin, indicating legal correspondence was being processed.
The correspondence mentions an intent to hand-deliver the letter and provide an extra copy for an individual referred to as 'the Col.'
